Reference version 0.0.3

Teal Core Functions

These are the main functions needed to build a teal app.

init

Create the Server and Ui Function for the Shiny App

module

Create a module with a new shiny page

modules

Create a collection of module and modules object

root_modules

Create the root modules container

Teal Modules

tm_data_table

Data Table Viewer Teal Module

tm_variable_browser

Variable Browser Teal Module

tm_scatterplot

Create a simple cross-table

tm_table

Create a simple cross-table

Custom Widgets and Layout

optionalSelectInput

Hide, Show Label only or display a selectInput

optionalSliderInput

if min or max are NA then the slider widget will be hidden

optionalSliderInputValMinMax

For teal modules we parameterize an optionalSliderInput with one argument value_min_max

standard_layout

Create a standard ui layout with output on the right and an encoding panel on the left

Reproducibility

get_rcode_header

Generates header text for analysis items

get_filter_txt

Generates text for the code to filter datasets

parse_code_chunks

Parse Code Chunks

reindent

Function for adding extra whitespaces at the beginning for indentation

showRCodeModal

Show R Code Modal

Helpers

as.global

Copy a variable to the global environment

generate_sample_data

Generate a Sample Dataset
